001package edu.cnm.deepdive.uno.service;
002
003import edu.cnm.deepdive.uno.model.domain.Game;
004import io.reactivex.rxjava3.core.Single;
005import retrofit2.http.GET;
006import retrofit2.http.Header;
007import retrofit2.http.Path;
008
009/**
010 * The {@code UnoServiceLongProxy} interface defines the API endpoint for interacting with the UNO web
011 * game service to long poll for game updates.
012 */
013public interface UnoServiceLongProxy {
014
015  /**
016   * Gets the Game from the UNO web service associated with the provided external gameKey.
017   *
018   * @param gameKey the external key associated with the game being retrieved.
019   * @return a {@code Single<Game>} which emits the Game associated with the external gameKey.
020   */
021  @GET("games/{gameKey}")
022  Single<Game> getGame(@Path("gameKey") String gameKey,
023      @Header("Authorization") String bearerToken);
024
025}
